traits.name: Enhanced Senses
traits.description: The axehound gains an advantage on non-attack tests that rely on smell

traits.name: Minion
traits.description: The axehound's attacks can't critcally hit, and they are immediatly defeated when they suffer an injury

actions.name: Pack Instincts
actions.description: While within 5 feet of an ally, the axehound can use the Gain Advantage action as a free action

actions.name: On the Hunt
actions.description: After an enemy within 30 feet of the axehound falls Prone, the axehound moves up to 15 feet toward them.

strikes.name: Bite
strikes.on-hit: and the axehoud can spend 1 focus to knock the target Prhone, then move up to 10 feet while dragging the target along.
strikes.description: Attack +4, reach 5ft., one target. Graze: 2(1d4) keen damage. Hit: 4 (1d4+2) keen damage and the axehoud can spend 1 focus to knock the target Prhone, then move up to 10 feet while dragging the target along.
